scripts.//: Aşağıdakiler opsiyonel: curl ile Windows/Linux için kısa yollar
scripts.ingest:synthetic:win:main: powershell -NoProfile -Command "Get-ChildItem synthetic\*.xml | ForEach-Object { curl.exe -s -X POST 'http://localhost:8080/ingest/junit' -H 'X-Project-Token: dev-token-123' -H 'X-Branch: main' -F 'file=@$($_.FullName);type=application/xml' > $null }"
scripts.ingest:synthetic:nix:main: bash -lc "for f in synthetic/*.xml; do curl -s -X POST 'http://localhost:8080/ingest/junit' -H 'X-Project-Token: dev-token-123' -H 'X-Branch: main' -F 'file=@$f;type=application/xml' >/dev/null; done"
